de.kaleidox.discordemoji

Class DiscordEmoji

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.discordemoji.DiscordEmoji

  • public final class DiscordEmoji
extends Object
    Facade class for communicating with https://discordemoji.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CompletableFuture<Collection<Emoji>> refreshEmojiCache()
      Refreshes the internal cache of Emojis and returns a collection of all cached emojis when done.
      static CompletableFuture<Collection<EmojiCategory>> refreshEmojiCategoryCache()
      Refreshes the internal cache of EmojiCategories and returns a collection of all cached emoji categories when done.
      static CompletableFuture<Collection<EmojiPack>> refreshEmojiPackCache()
      Refreshes the internal cache of EmojiPacks and returns a collection of all cached emoji packs when done.
      static CompletableFuture<PageStats> requestPageStats()
      Requests the current stats of https://discordemoji.com/.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • refreshEmojiCache

        public static CompletableFuture<Collection<Emoji>> refreshEmojiCache()
        Refreshes the internal cache of Emojis and returns a collection of all cached emojis when done.
        Returns:
        A future completing with all cached Emojis.

      • refreshEmojiPackCache

        public static CompletableFuture<Collection<EmojiPack>> refreshEmojiPackCache()
        Refreshes the internal cache of EmojiPacks and returns a collection of all cached emoji packs when done.
        Returns:
        A future completing with all cached EmojiPacks.

      • refreshEmojiCategoryCache

        public static CompletableFuture<Collection<EmojiCategory>> refreshEmojiCategoryCache()
        Refreshes the internal cache of EmojiCategories and returns a collection of all cached emoji categories when done.
        Returns:
        A future completing with all cached EmojiCategories.

      • requestPageStats

        public static CompletableFuture<PageStats> requestPageStats()
        Requests the current stats of https://discordemoji.com/.
        Returns:
        A future completing with a new PageStats object.
